vietfood_menu.name: Pho
vietfood_menu.description: A traditional Vietnamese soup consisting of broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat, usually made with beef (pho bo) or chicken (pho ga).

vietfood_menu.name: Banh Mi
vietfood_menu.description: A Vietnamese sandwich that consists of a crispy baguette filled with meats, vegetables, and condiments such as pâté, pickled carrots, daikon, and cilantro.

vietfood_menu.name: Bun Bo Hue
vietfood_menu.description: A spicy Vietnamese soup containing rice vermicelli and beef, flavored with lemongrass and topped with various herbs and vegetables.

vietfood_menu.name: Com Tam
vietfood_menu.description: A Vietnamese dish made from fractured rice grains, often served with grilled pork, egg, and pickled vegetables.

vietfood_menu.name: Goi Cuon
vietfood_menu.description: Vietnamese fresh spring rolls made with rice paper and typically filled with shrimp, pork, fresh vegetables, and vermicelli noodles, served with a dipping sauce.

vietfood_menu.name: Cha Gio
vietfood_menu.description: Vietnamese fried spring rolls made with a mixture of ground pork, mushrooms, and glass noodles, wrapped in rice paper and deep-fried.

vietfood_menu.name: Ca Kho To
vietfood_menu.description: A savory caramelized fish dish cooked in a clay pot with fish sauce, sugar, and pepper, served with rice.

vietfood_menu.name: Banh Xeo
vietfood_menu.description: A Vietnamese savory pancake filled with shrimp, pork, and bean sprouts, served with lettuce and herbs.

vietfood_menu.name: Bun Cha
vietfood_menu.description: A Vietnamese dish of grilled pork served with vermicelli noodles, fresh herbs, and a dipping sauce.

vietfood_menu.name: Hu Tieu
vietfood_menu.description: A noodle soup made with a clear and savory broth, served with different types of meat and seafood, and topped with herbs and vegetables.
